root.name: Van Helsing
root.description: OverviewBased on the 2004 action film. You take the place of Van Helsing, a monster hunter who belongs to a secret society known as "The Knights of the Holy Order". The main objective of the game is to hunt down Dracula and kill him. During the course of the game, you will fight and meet classic horror monsters such as Mr. Hyde, Frankenstein's Monster, and Wolf Man.The gameplay is based largely on the Devil May Cry games. As the game goes on, you will find and unlock various weapons and upgrades. Unlike Devil May Cry, however, the game utilizes a 'finishing move' which becomes available every 5 kills.
